normalised: Folks, buckle up! It's that time of year again - the Pro Kabaddi League (P K L) transfer window is open, and the rumor mills are churning faster than a lassi maker at a Delhi wedding! This year promises to be a cracker, with teams jostling to secure the best raiders and defenders for the upcoming season.
